BasicDDEvaluator

enspire.interactivity.evaluation.BasicSortingEvaluator
enspire.interactivity.evaluation.BasicDDEvaluator

The most basic class to evaluate drag and drop sorting-based activities.

This class returns an evaluation of type SimpleDDEvaluation in its evaluate() method.
